name: Engagedots
tag_list: crm-software, contact-management, sales-management, team-management, task-management, performance-management
overview:
About Engagedots

Engagedots is an enterprise business solutions providing you a complete service to enhance the management, employees and customers with the integrated business tool. We are here to provide you, end to end solution under single platform. Some of our modules include contact management, sales management, task management, performance management, project management, employee collaboration, employee management, etc. . Selecting the right modules which aptly suit your industry can help to improve your productivity. Engagedots provides multiple business solutions under single interface.
